Dear Sir,


Greetings from Gargash Insurance Brokers!


We hope this message finds you well.

 

As the largest national insurance broker in the United Arab Emirates and the first accredited Chartered Insurance Broker in the region, we take pride in being a leading professional insurance intermediary in the GCC. With a rich heritage dating back to 1958 as part of the esteemed Gargash Group of Companies, we have established ourselves as experts in insurance broking and consultancy services.

 

At Gargash Insurance Brokers, we offer a comprehensive range of insurance solutions, tailored to meet your needs, including:

As the largest national insurance broker in the United Arab Emirates and the first accredited Chartered Insurance Broker in the region, we take pride in being a leading professional insurance intermediary in the GCC. With a rich heritage dating back to 1958 as part of the esteemed Gargash Group of Companies, we have established ourselves as experts in insurance broking and consultancy services.

 

At Gargash Insurance Brokers, we offer a comprehensive range of insurance solutions, tailored to meet your needs, including:

*	Motor/Motor Fleet Insurance
*	Individual/Group Medical Insurance (Enhanced/Employee Benefit Plans)
*	Public/Third-Party Liability Insurance
*	Property All Risk Insurance
*	Contractors All Risk Insurance
*	Credit Insurance (coverage for receivables)
*	Professional Indemnity Insurance
*	Surety Bonds
*	And more

 

We would be delighted to arrange a meeting to discuss how we can support your insurance requirements and provide the best premiums and services in the market.

 

We look forward to the opportunity to assist you.

 



Thanks & Regards,



ISMAIL ASIF
